section:
EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GinRummy.GinRummyComputerPlayer< T > Class Template Reference EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GinRummy.GinRummyComputerPlayer< T >
A GinRummyComputerPlayer is a virtual game support object related to a real-world player. This player makes decisions in order to beat the human player. It represents the other player playing against the one playing the game. It maintains a hand and makes better or worse decisions based on its set skill level/difficulty.
Inheritance diagram for EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GinRummy.GinRummyComputerPlayer< T >:
Collaboration diagram for EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GinRummy.GinRummyComputerPlayer< T >:
Public Member Functions
GinRummyComputerPlayer ()
Create a new computer player with an empty hand with a skill level of beginner.
bool ShouldDrawFromDiscardPile (T topCardOfDiscardPile)
Check to see if the discard pile card will be drawn by the computer player. If the discard pile is not drawn, the computer player will choose to draw a card from the deck or pass.
T SelectAndRemoveDiscardedCard ()
Return a card that will be removed from the hand as a discard action
T? DetermineKnockOrDiscardAction ()
Determines whether or not to knock or discard. Returns null if a knock is not performed.
Properties
SkillLevel SkillLevel [get, set]
Detailed Description
A GinRummyComputerPlayer is a virtual game support object related to a real-world player. This player makes decisions in order to beat the human player. It represents the other player playing against the one playing the game. It maintains a hand and makes better or worse decisions based on its set skill level/difficulty.
Template Parameters
T
A playing card or a subtype of playing card
Type Constraints
T:PlayingCard

Determines whether or not to knock or discard. Returns null if a knock is not performed.
Returns
Either null or a card from the hand that the computer wishes to knock with

ShouldDrawFromDiscardPile() ShouldDrawFromDiscardPileEarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GinRummy.GinRummyComputerPlayer< T > EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GinRummy.GinRummyComputerPlayer< T >ShouldDrawFromDiscardPile
bool EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GinRummy.GinRummyComputerPlayer< T >.ShouldDrawFromDiscardPile (T topCardOfDiscardPile)
Check to see if the discard pile card will be drawn by the computer player. If the discard pile is not drawn, the computer player will choose to draw a card from the deck or pass.
Parameters
topCardOfDiscardPile
What the card on the discard pile was
Returns
Whether the computer chose to draw the discard pile card
